00003 #define _BreadPlane_h_

00005 #include "BreadVector3.h"
00006 
00007 namespace Bread
00008 {
00013     class cPlane
00014     {
00015     public:
00023         cPlane(float a, float b, float c, float d)
00024         {
00025             m_normal.m_x = a;
00026             m_normal.m_y = b;
00027             m_normal.m_z = c;
00028             m_d = d;
00029         }
00030         ~cPlane()   {}
00031 
00032         float test(const cVector3& point) const
00033         {
00034             return m_normal.dot(point) + m_d;
00035         }
00036 
00037     public:
00038         cVector3 m_normal;
00039         float    m_d;
00040     };
00041 }
